Klasse Game

java.lang.Object
model.game.Game
public class Game extends Object
Main game class that manages players, the board, turns, phases, and card decks.

It handles game state changes, notifications, and interactions between game components.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Game

      public Game()
      Main game class that manages players, the board, turns, phases, and card decks. It handles game state changes, notifications, and interactions between game components.

  • Methodendetails

    • getInstance

      public static Game getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the game.
      Gibt zurück:
      the current Game instance.

    • setServer

      public void setServer(Server server)

    • setLogger

      public void setLogger(Logger loggerFromServer)

    • initializeDeck

      public void initializeDeck()
      Initializes all card decks used in the game.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game by building the board, setting checkpoints, and starting the setup.

    • buildBoard

      public void buildBoard()
      Builds the game board from a JSON map and notifies clients that the game has started.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a new player to the game.
      Parameter:
      player - the player to add.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(Player player)
      Removes a player from the game.
      Parameter:
      player - the player to remove.

    • removePlayerByID

      public void removePlayerByID(int clientID)
      Removes a player by their client ID.
      Parameter:
      clientID - the ID of the player to remove.

    • startSetUpPhase

      public void startSetUpPhase()
      Starts the setup phase by setting the game state and initializing the first players turn.

    • takeTurnSetUp

      public void takeTurnSetUp(Player player, int[] startingPosition)
      Sets up the player's turn by selecting their robots starting position.
      Parameter:
      player - the player taking their turn
      startingPosition - the chosen starting position for the players robot

    • startUpgradePhase

      public void startUpgradePhase()
      Starts the upgrade phase. Resets players chosen-flags and moves to the next phase based on priority.

    • buyUpgrade

      public void buyUpgrade(Player player, String upCard, boolean isBuying)
      Processes the purchase of an upgrade card.
      Parameter:
      player - the player buying an upgrade.
      upCard - the name of the upgrade card.
      isBuying - true if the player is buying, false otherwise.

    • takeTurnProgramming

      public void takeTurnProgramming(Player player, String cardName, int position)
      Allows a player to select a programming card for their register during the programming phase.
      Parameter:
      player - the player taking their turn
      cardName - the name of the programming card to select
      position - the register slot where the card will be placed

    • resetProgrammingDeck

      public void resetProgrammingDeck(Player player)
      Resets a player's programming deck by moving cards from their discard deck back into it, shuffling the deck for a random order.
      Parameter:
      player - the player whose programming deck will be reset

    • notifyCardSelection

      public void notifyCardSelection(int playerId, int registerPosition, boolean filled)
      Notifies all players that a player has finished selecting their cards.
      Parameter:
      playerId - the player who has selected a card for their register.
      registerPosition - the register which has been filled.
      filled - true if a register has been filled, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()

    • isCurrentPlayer

      public boolean isCurrentPlayer(Player player)

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer(Player player)
      Sets the current player and notifies all clients.
      Parameter:
      player - the player to set as current.

    • setCheckpointsToWin

      public void setCheckpointsToWin(Board board)
      Sets the number of checkpoints required to win based on the board configuration.
      Parameter:
      board - the game board from which to retrieve the number of checkpoints.

    • assignRandomFigureId

      public int assignRandomFigureId()
      Assigns a random available robot to a player.
      Gibt zurück:
      the assigned robot ID, or -1 if no robots are available.

    • getRobotNameById

      public String getRobotNameById(int robotId)

    • getRobotById

      public Robot getRobotById(int robotId)

    • isFigureAvailable

      public boolean isFigureAvailable(int figureId)

    • assignFigure

      public void assignFigure(Player player, int figureId)
      Assigns the specified figure to a player.

      If the figureId is valid (not -1), it removes the figure from the available set, assigns the corresponding robot to the player, and sets the player's robot.

      Parameter:
      player - the player to assign the robot to.
      figureId - the ID of the figure (robot) to assign.

    • makeFigureAvailable

      public void makeFigureAvailable(int figureId)
      Marks a figure as available by adding its ID back to the available set if not already present.
      Parameter:
      figureId - the ID of the figure to make available.

    • playCard

      public void playCard(Player player, String cardName)
      Plays a specified card for a given player, applying its effects.

      If the card type is "AGAIN," the effect of the last played card is reapplied. Otherwise, the effect of the specified card is applied. Invalid card names result in an error message.

      Parameter:
      player - The Player who is playing the card.
      cardName - The name of the card to be played.

    • notifyCardPlayed

      public void notifyCardPlayed(int playerId, String cardName)
      Broadcasts a message to all players indicating that a card has been played.
      Parameter:
      playerId - the ID of the player who played the card.
      cardName - the name of the played card.

    • getCardTypeByName

      public CardType getCardTypeByName(String cardName)
      Retrieves a CardType by its name.

      This method searches through available ProgrammingCardType and DamageCardType enums to find a matching card by name. The comparison is case-insensitive.

      Parameter:
      cardName - The name of the card to look up.
      Gibt zurück:
      The CardType that matches the name, or null if no match is found.

    • getPlayers

      public List<Player> getPlayers()

    • getPlayerById

      public Player getPlayerById(int id)

    • notifyCheckpointReached

      public void notifyCheckpointReached(int clientID, int checkpointNumber)
      Notifies all players that a particular client reached a specific checkpoint on the board.
      Parameter:
      clientID - the ID of the client who reached the checkpoint
      checkpointNumber - the number of the checkpoint reached

    • notifyEnergyValues

      public void notifyEnergyValues(Player player, String source)
      Notifies all players about updated energy values for a specific player.
      Parameter:
      player - the Player whose energy value changed
      source - a short descriptor indicating the source of the energy gain (e.g. "EnergySpace")

    • notifyMovement

      public void notifyMovement(int playerId, int x, int y)
      Notifies all players about a movement event, indicating that a player moved to a new position.
      Parameter:
      playerId - the ID of the player whose robot has moved
      x - the new x-coordinate of the robot
      y - the new y-coordinate of the robot

    • notifyTurning

      public void notifyTurning(int playerId, String rotation)
      Notifies all players that a player's robot has turned in a specified rotation.
      Parameter:
      playerId - the ID of the player whose robot is turning
      rotation - the rotation direction (e.g., "clockwise" or "counterclockwise")

    • notifyReboot

      public void notifyReboot(int playerId)
      Notifies all players that a particular player's robot is rebooting.
      Parameter:
      playerId - the ID of the player whose robot is rebooting

    • notifyAnimation

      public void notifyAnimation(String type)
      Notifies all players that a specific animation type should be triggered.
      Parameter:
      type - a string representing the type of animation (e.g., a key or identifier)

    • notifyReplaceCard

      public void notifyReplaceCard(int register, String newCard, int playerId)
      Notifies all players that a player's card in a given register has been replaced with a new card.
      Parameter:
      register - the register index where the card replacement occurred
      newCard - the name or type of the new card placed in the register
      playerId - the ID of the player whose card was replaced

    • notifyGameFinished

      public void notifyGameFinished(Player player)
      Notifies all players that the game has finished and broadcasts the winner's ID. Also sets the server state to indicate that the game is no longer running.
      Parameter:
      player - the winning Player

    • setBoardName

      public void setBoardName(String board)

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()

    • drawDamageCard

      public void drawDamageCard(Player player, DamageCardType card, int count)
      Draws a specified count of damage cards from the appropriate deck for a player. Adds these cards to the player's personal discard deck and notifies other players. If the deck is empty before drawing the needed cards, prompts the player to pick damage from available piles.
      Parameter:
      player - the Player receiving the damage cards
      card - the type of damage card (e.g., SPAM, VIRUS, TROJAN, WORM)
      count - how many cards should be drawn

    • notifyPickDamage

      public void notifyPickDamage(Player player, int count, List<String> availablePiles)
      Notifies a specific player that they must pick a certain number of damage cards from the provided available piles.
      Parameter:
      player - the Player who must pick the damage
      count - the number of damage cards the player needs to pick
      availablePiles - a list of available damage card piles (e.g., "Spam", "Trojan")

    • notifyDrawDamage

      public void notifyDrawDamage(Player player, List<String> cards)
      Notifies all players about damage cards that a specific player has drawn.
      Parameter:
      player - the Player who drew the damage cards
      cards - a list of names/types of the drawn damage cards

    • getPlayerByRobot

      public Player getPlayerByRobot(Robot robot)
      Returns a Player instance associated with the specified robot.
      Parameter:
      robot - the Robot whose owning player is being queried
      Gibt zurück:
      the corresponding Player, or null if not found

    • setSelectedDamage

      public void setSelectedDamage(Player player, List<String> selectedCards)
      Selects the requested damage card types for a player and adds them to the player's discard deck.
      Parameter:
      player - the Player who is selecting the damage cards
      selectedCards - a list of damage card names/types (e.g., "Spam", "Virus")

    • getGameState

      public GameState getGameState()

    • getMinPlayers

      public int getMinPlayers()

      public void addPlayerToAdminPrivilege(int clientID, int register)
      Adds a player to the admin privilege mapping.
      Parameter:
      clientID - the client ID.
      register - the register index.

    • getPlayerToAdminPrivilege

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getPlayerToAdminPrivilege()

    • getCurrentRegisterIndex

      public int getCurrentRegisterIndex()

    • notifyCheckpointMoved

      public void notifyCheckpointMoved(int x, int y, int checkpointID)
      Notifies that a checkpoint has moved.
      Parameter:
      x - the new x-coordinate.
      y - the new y-coordinate.
      checkpointID - the checkpoint ID.

    • handleMemorySwap

      public void handleMemorySwap(Robot robot)
      Handles memory swap by drawing three new cards for a player.
      Parameter:
      robot - the robot belonging to the player.

    • handleSpamBlocker

      public void handleSpamBlocker(Robot robot)
      Handles the effect of the SpamBlocker card.
      Parameter:
      robot - the robot belonging to the player.
